attachments.title: Dutch firm creates coronavirus test with results in just 15 minutes
attachments.text: Sensitest's blood test, manufactured in China, shows results like a pregnancy stick. The small company said it would be open for negotiations with governments to supply thousands.
attachments.fallback: Mail Online: Dutch firm creates coronavirus test with results in just 15 minutes

text: <https://coronavirustechhandbook.com/home>

attachments.title: Contents | Coronavirus Tech Handbook
attachments.text: A crowdsourced set of tech, tools and data relating to the Coronavirus Pandemic

text:
Hello!

I developed a prototype of a deep learning tool to diagnose frontal chest X-ray images and recognize bacterial pneumonia, viral pneumonia and coronavirus. The website was developed to allow people to have contact with deep learning tools, to learn how they work, their limitations, to show the potential of public datasets used to create systems like this and to create models that can be scaled to provide medical tools for the world.

Visit: <https://synthetic.network/>

Sincerely,

José Lucas Teixeira de Oliveira

attachments.title: Synthetic.Network
attachments.text: A prototype of a deep learning tool to diagnose frontal chest X-ray images and recognize bacterial pneumonia, viral pneumonia and coronavirus.

text:
Tigray officially to declare State of Emergency to control #CoronaVirus.
Dr. Debretsion will be giving a press release about this tomorrow.

elements.text:
Tigray officially to declare State of Emergency to control #CoronaVirus.
Dr. Debretsion will be giving a press release about this tomorrow.

text: As we know, in order to control the spread of COVID-19, the Ethiopian Government has decided to quarantine all arriving passengers entering Ethiopia for 14 days at the expense of the passengers.  Passengers are being stranded for 10+ hours at the airport with limited food/water & information.  Those who cannot afford to pay for hotels are being quarantined at Bole High School. I am bringing this to your attention to see if you have any ideas on how we can help with the lack of communication, preparation, and organization in coordinating quarantine efforts for arriving passengers.

elements.text: As we know, in order to control the spread of COVID-19, the Ethiopian Government has decided to quarantine all arriving passengers entering Ethiopia for 14 days at the expense of the passengers.  Passengers are being stranded for 10+ hours at the airport with limited food/water & information.  Those who cannot afford to pay for hotels are being quarantined at Bole High School. I am bringing this to your attention to see if you have any ideas on how we can help with the lack of communication, preparation, and organization in coordinating quarantine efforts for arriving passengers.

text: I would say this should also include middle to small sized hotels. Now the options are the most expensive one and the least comfortable once.  We should build a system that serves as a bridge between the travelers and hotels, who are in need of customers.

text: I don’t think anyone would want to stay in a one room with 5-6 strangers for 2 weeks. Specially, someone with average budget who is willing to spend $ to get a small single room.
